hero.title: Connecting the
hero.subtitle: Telecom Pro is the most innovative telecommunications provider in Uzbekistan. Our goal is to connect every household and business to the high-speed digital world.

m1.title: Our Mission
m1.text: Eliminate digital inequality and create equal opportunities for everyone.

m2.title: Our Clients
m2.text: More than 2.4 million active users place their trust in us.

m3.title: Security
m3.text: Data privacy and network stability are our primary priorities.

timeline.title: Company founded
timeline.desc: The first fiber-optic network was launched in Tashkent.

timeline.title: 5G pilot project
timeline.desc: One of the first in Central Asia to test the 5G network.

timeline.title: Global partnership
timeline.desc: Directly connected with international backbone providers.

timeline.title: National coverage
timeline.desc: Launched our services in all regions of Uzbekistan.

team.title: Our
team.subtitle: The most qualified specialists in the industry are at your service.

ecosystem.title: Universal Digital
ecosystem.subtitle: We are not just a provider. We have combined all the digital services that make your life easier into one platform.

features.title: Reliability
features.text: 9 years of experience and millions of clients.
